com.dhemery.victor.device

Class SimulatedIosDevice

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.dhemery.victor.device.SimulatedIosDevice
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IosDevice

    public class SimulatedIosDevice
extends Object
implements IosDevice
    Interacts with a simulated iOS device through a various agents.
